00015 Inspector::~Inspector() {
00016

00020 Inspector::Inspector(Processor* p) :
00021         SmppNwIf() {
00022         ton = 0;
00023         npi = 0;
00024         port = 9932;
00025         m_systemId = "mobitek8";
00026         password = "jmagazin";
00027         systype = "VMA";
00028         recvBuf = new char[RECBBUFLEN];
00029         proc = p;
00030         sndr = NULL;
00031         rcvr = NULL;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void Inspector::SendUnbind(TCPSocket* sock) throw (std::exception) {
00035 
00036         Smpp::Unbind *un = new Smpp::Unbind();
00037         un->sequence_number(proc->GetSeqNum());
00038 
00039         int bytesSent = SendPdu(sock, (Smpp::Header*) un);
00040         if (bytesSent <= 0) {
00041                 throw(TcpSocketException("network error"));
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 int Inspector::RecvUnbindResp(TCPSocket* sock) throw (std::exception) {
00046 
00047         int status = -1;
00048         Smpp::Header* hdr = RecvPdu(sock);
00049         if (hdr != NULL)
00050                 status = hdr->command_status();
00051         return status;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void Inspector::SendBind(TCPSocket* sock) throw (std::exception) {
00055 
00056         int bytesSent = 0;
00057         Smpp::Header* hdr = NULL;
00058         Smpp::BindReceiver rvpdu;
00059         Smpp::BindTransceiver tvpdu;
00060         Smpp::BindTransmitter pdu;
00061 
00062         switch (type) {
00063         case bindReciever:
00064                 rvpdu.system_id(m_systemId.c_str());
00065                 rvpdu.password(password.c_str());
00066                 rvpdu.system_type(systype.c_str());
00067                 rvpdu.interface_version(0x34);
00068                 rvpdu.addr_npi(npi);
00069                 rvpdu.addr_ton(ton);
00070                 hdr = &rvpdu;
00071                 break;
00072 
00073         case bindTranciever:
00074                 tvpdu.system_id(m_systemId.c_str());
00075                 tvpdu.password(password.c_str());
00076                 tvpdu.system_type(systype.c_str());
00077                 tvpdu.interface_version(0x34);
00078                 tvpdu.addr_npi(npi);
00079                 tvpdu.addr_ton(ton);
00080                 hdr = &tvpdu;
00081                 break;
00082 
00083         case bindTransmiter:
00084                 pdu.system_id(m_systemId.c_str());
00085                 pdu.password(password.c_str());
00086                 pdu.system_type(systype.c_str());
00087                 pdu.interface_version(0x34);
00088                 pdu.addr_npi(npi);
00089                 pdu.addr_ton(ton);
00090                 hdr = &pdu;
00091                 break;
00092         }
00093 
00094         if (hdr != NULL) {
00095                 bytesSent = SendPdu(sock, hdr);
00096                 if (bytesSent <= 0) {
00097                         throw(TcpSocketException("network error"));
00098                 }
00099         }
00100 
00101         m_logger->debug("Sending a bind");
00102 
00103 }

00105 void Inspector::SendBindResp(TCPSocket* sock, BindType type)
00106                 throw (std::exception) {
00107 
00108         int bytesSent = 0;
00109         Smpp::Header* hdr = NULL;
00110         Smpp::BindReceiverResp* rvr = NULL;
00111         Smpp::BindTransceiverResp* tvr = NULL;
00112         Smpp::BindTransmitterResp* tmr = NULL;
00113 
00114         switch (type) {
00115         case bindReciever:
00116                 rvr = new Smpp::BindReceiverResp();
00117                 rvr->system_id("m.smpp_router");
00118                 hdr = rvr;
00119                 break;
00120 
00121         case bindTranciever:
00122                 tvr = new Smpp::BindTransceiverResp();
00123                 tvr->system_id("m.smpp_router");
00124                 hdr = tvr;
00125 
00126                 break;
00127 
00128         case bindTransmiter:
00129                 tmr = new Smpp::BindTransmitterResp();
00130                 tmr->system_id("m.smpp_router");
00131                 hdr = tmr;
00132 
00133                 break;
00134         }
00135 
00136         if (hdr != NULL) {
00137                 bytesSent = SendPdu(sock, hdr);
00138                 if (bytesSent <= 0) {
00139                         throw(TcpSocketException("network error"));
00140                 }
00141                 delete hdr;
00142         }
00143 
00144         m_logger->debug("send bind ack");
00145 
00146 }

00148 BindParams Inspector::RecvBind(TCPSocket* sock) throw (std::exception) {
00149         std::string sType;
00150         BindType tp;
00151         Smpp::BindReceiver* brv;
00152         Smpp::BindTransceiver* btv;
00153         Smpp::BindTransmitter* btm;
00154         Smpp::Header* hdr = RecvPdu(sock);
00155         if (hdr == NULL) {
00156                 m_logger->error("RecvPdu return error");
00157                 throw NetworkException("recv return error");
00158         }
00159 
00160         switch (hdr->command_id()) {
00161         case Smpp::CommandId::BindReceiver:
00162                 brv = (Smpp::BindReceiver*) hdr;
00163                 //              system_id();
00164                 m_systemId = brv->system_id();
00165                 password = brv->password();
00166                 type = bindTransmiter;
00167                 addr = inet_ntoa(sock->remote.sin_addr);
00168                 port = ntohs(sock->remote.sin_port);
00169                 sType = "BindReceiver";
00170                 tp = bindReciever;
00171                 break;
00172 
00173         case Smpp::CommandId::BindTransceiver:
00174                 btv = (Smpp::BindTransceiver*) hdr;
00175                 m_systemId = btv->system_id();
00176                 password = btv->password();
00177                 type = bindTransmiter;
00178                 addr = inet_ntoa(sock->remote.sin_addr);
00179                 port = ntohs(sock->remote.sin_port);
00180                 sType = "BindTransceiver";
00181                 tp = bindTranciever;
00182                 break;
00183 
00184         case Smpp::CommandId::BindTransmitter:
00185                 btm = (Smpp::BindTransmitter*) hdr;
00186                 m_systemId = btm->system_id();
00187                 password = btm->password();
00188                 type = bindTransmiter;
00189                 addr = inet_ntoa(sock->remote.sin_addr);
00190                 port = ntohs(sock->remote.sin_port);
00191                 sType = "BindTransmitter";
00192                 tp = bindTransmiter;
00193                 break;
00194         default:
00195                 m_logger->error("unknown data type recv");
00196                 throw NetworkException("unknown data");
00197                 break;
00198 
00199         }
00200 
00201         CDRlogger->info(
00202                         "INBOUND CONNECTION from (%s:%u), login %s, pass %s, type %s",
00203                         addr.c_str(), port, m_systemId.c_str(), password.c_str(), sType.c_str());
00204 
00205         BindParams params;
00206         params.sysId = m_systemId;
00207         params.type = tp;
00208         return params;
00209 
00210 }
00211 
00212 int Inspector::RecvBindResp(TCPSocket* sock) throw (std::exception) {
00213         std::string sType;
00214         Smpp::Header* hdr = RecvPdu(sock);
00215         if (hdr == NULL) {
00216                 m_logger->error("RecvPdu return error");
00217                 throw NetworkException("recv return error");
00218         }
00219 
00220         m_logger->trace("recv bind ack");
00221 
00222         switch (type) {
00223         case bindReciever:
00224                 sType = "BindReceiver";
00225                 break;
00226         case bindTranciever:
00227                 sType = "BindTransceiver";
00228                 break;
00229         case bindTransmiter:
00230                 sType = "BindTransmitter";
00231                 break;
00232         }
00233 
00234         switch (hdr->command_status()) {
00235         case Smpp::CommandStatus::ESME_ROK:
00236                 CDRlogger->info(
00237                                 "OUTBOUND CONNECTION to (%s:%u) login %s, pass %s, type %s",
00238                                 addr.c_str(), port, m_systemId.c_str(), password.c_str(),
00239                                 sType.c_str());
00240                 break;
00241 
00242         case Smpp::CommandStatus::ESME_RALYBND:
00243                 m_logger->warn(
00244                                 "already binded to to (%s:%u) login %s, pass %s, type %s. unbind",
00245                                 addr.c_str(), port, m_systemId.c_str(), password.c_str(),
00246                                 sType.c_str());
00247                 break;
00248 
00249         default:
00250                 m_logger->warn("unknown status %u", hdr->command_status());
00251                 break;
00252         }
00253 
00254         return hdr->command_status();
00255 
00256 }
